mainTitle: Roulette on the Web | Create your own original roulette
description: Free custom roulette creation tool for the web. You can quickly create your own lottery roulette by setting up your favorite items and ratios. No registration required, PC and smartphone compatible.
copyright: Roulette on the Web. All Rights Reserved.
footerTagline: Create and share your own custom roulettes instantly.
cookieBannerText: This site uses cookies for traffic analysis. By consenting to the use of cookies, you help us provide a better service.
declineConfirmation: Your settings have been saved. No information will be collected on this site.
loginFeatureDescription: Save your roulettes and access them from any device.
myPageFeatureDescription: Manage your saved roulettes and view your history.
templatesFeatureDescription: Choose from a variety of pre-made templates to get started quickly.
